overview: Older but no wiser, Blondie and Dagwood Bumstead enter a songwriting contest.  It's all part of a plan to cover charity checks that they've signed separately but can't cover.  Along the way, Blondie's blood boils when Dagwood gets innocently mixed up with beautiful music teacher Rita Rogers.
tagline: Can Dagwood help it if he's IRRESISTIBLE?
title: Leave It to Blondie
